channel.title: Membership
channel.description: hey i have a 317 and i wanted to know how to make membership. like, some skills you need to be a member to level up. ?? thanks

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Pzezima2:

hey i have a 317 and i wanted to know how to make membership. like, some skills you need to be a member to level up. ?? thanks

Just make it like this:
Not how it would look but:

if (member = false)
SMITHING CODE SMITHING CODE

} else {
sM(“You need to be a member to do smithing! Subscribe today to unlock this!”);
}

get how this would work?

BTW this is kind of how it would work on delta.

Read full topic
